data.title: Alexandra Chando and Blair Redford talk THE LYING GAME
data.meta_description: About a month ago, I had the chance to chat with some of your favorite ABCFamily stars at the ABC Family Winter Wonderland event in New York City.  The first video from the event features Alexandra…
data.text:
About a month ago, I had the chance to chat with some of your favorite ABCFamily stars at the ABC Family Winter Wonderland event in New York City. The first video from the event features Alexandra Chando (Emma/Sutton) and Blair Redford (Ethan) talking about what’s coming up on THE LYING GAME when the show returns tonight, after PRETTY LITTLE LIARS, at 9/8c on ABC Fam (apologies for how loud the video is. I did my best to eliminate the background noise, but holy heavens, that was the loudest carpet I’ve EVER been on)!

Will you be watching tonight? What would you love to see for Ethan and Emma or Ethan and Sutton or Emma and Sutton??
